search.lede: Fill in at least one of these fields to find a registration

eligibility.header: Based on the information below, this applicant appears to be:

general.security: This information is kept confidential and secure as required by law. <1>Learn more</1>
general.leaveBlank: Puede dejar esta casilla vacía si no desea responder.

options: Indio americano o nativo de Alaska
Nativo de Hawái u otra isla del Pacífico

errors.county: Por favor, selecione el condado del menú
errors.date: Proporcione una fecha válida - Véase el ejemplo

dob.day: Provide a valid day - Ex 1 or 01
dob.month: Provide a valid month - Ex 1 or 01

errors.dropdown: Please choose a value from this list
errors.ethnicity: Please choose from the available options
errors.email: Proporcione una dirección de correo electrónico válida
errors.length: {{ fieldName }} must be exactly {{ length }} digits
errors.positiveNumber: This value can't be less than zero
errors.phone: Enter a 10 digit phone number staring with area code
errors.ssn: El Número de seguro social debe tener 9 dígitos
errors.state: Seleccione un estado entre las opciones del menú; Este programa D-SNAP es solo para residentes de {{ state }}
errors.zipcode: Proporcione el código postal de 5 dígitos - Ej. 48154

welcome.lede: Este sitio le ayudará a registrarse para recibir beneficios temporales a través del Programa Suplementario para Nutrición en Caso de Desastres (D-SNAP, Disaster Supplemental Nutrition Assistance Program).

body: Vivió (o trabajó) en un área afectada durante el desastre.
Padeció un efecto adverso debido al desastre. Como por ejemplo:
Una pérdida, reducción o retraso en sus ingresos.
Incapacidad de acceder a activos líquidos, tales como dinero de cuentas bancarias.
Pago de gastos relativos al desastre por los cuales no espera ser reembolsado antes de [end of benefit period].

preregistration.header: Vamos a llevarle al lugar correcto.

error.server: We are experiencing issues contacting the server. Please try again in a few moments

storage.label: ¿Qué tipo de dispositivo está usando para ver este sitio?

confirm.label: Computadora privada o teléfono
confirm.explanation: Guardaremos su información en su dispositivo a medida que avance, en caso de que necesite salir y terminar más tarde.

deny.label: Computadora pública
deny.explanation: No guardaremos su información, así que asegúrese de terminar su registro antes de salir.

preparation.header: De acuerdo, deberá proporcionar algunos datos para registrarse.

body: Nombre, dirección y fecha de nacimiento suyo y de los miembros de su hogar.
Dinero ingresado por empleo u otras fuentes, y datos del empleador

firstName.label: ¿Cuál es su primer nombre legal?
firstName.explanation: Tal como se muestra en los documentos legales, como por ejemplo un certificado de nacimiento. Esto nos ayuda a verificar quién es.

currentMailingAddress.label: ¿Recibe actualmente su correo en esta dirección?

email.label: ¿Cuál es su dirección de correo electrónico (si tiene una)?

offramp.copy: Ahora le haremos una serie de preguntas sobre usted y las personas con las que compra y comparte la comida.

personalInfo.header: Ahora, unas preguntas más sobre usted.

stateId.label: ¿Cuál es su licencia de conducir o número de identificación estatal?
stateId.explanation: Puede dejar esta casilla vacía si no lo sabe o no lo tiene disponible. Proporcionarlo nos ayudará a verificar su información más rápido.

ssn.label: ¿Cuál es su número de Seguro Social (SSN, Social Security Number)?
ssn.explanation: Puede dejar esta casilla vacía si no lo sabe o no lo tiene disponible. Proporcionarlo nos ayudará a verificar su información más rápido.

sex.label: ¿Cuál es su sexo?
sex.explanation: Tal como se muestra en los documentos legales, como por ejemplo un certificado de nacimiento. Puede dejar esta casilla vacía si no desea responder.

whyAsk.header: ¿Por qué preguntamos por sexo, etnicidad, raza?
whyAsk.copy:
We use your Social Security Number to check information about to find out what you qualify for as we go through these steps.
 With your Social Security Number, we may be able to sign you up for services today.
 You do not have to provide your Social Security Number right now, but if you choose not to, you will be asked to provide documents that prove things like your income sources.

count.header: Now tell us about people you share food with.
count.label: On {{ benefitStartDate }}, how many people in your home did you regularly buy food for and prepare meals with, including yourself?
count.explanation: Count your roommates if you often buy food and cook together.

memberNames.header: OK {{ customerName }}, you share meals with {{ count }} people.

getPrepared.header: Now, we'll need some info about each person.

conditions.header: We’ll ask about the following from the people you listed so far:

memberDetails.none: You didn't indicate any other members of your household
memberDetails.header: Great! Let’s get more info about {{ firstName }}.

dob.label: What is {{ firstName }}'s date of birth?

ssn.label: What is {{ firstName }}'s Social Security Number (SSN)?
ssn.explanation: You can leave this blank if you don't know it or if they don't have one. Providing one will help verify and move you faster in the application process.

sex.label: What is {{ firstName }}'s sex?
sex.explanation: As shown in legal documents such as a birth certificate.

foodAssistance.header: We need to ask you about food assistance
foodAssistance.label: Check all people who receive food assistance

impact.header: Now, tell us how you were impacted by the disaster.

buyFood.label: Has your household bought food or plan to buy food between {{ benefitStartDate }} and {{ benefitEndDate }}?

lostOrInaccessibleIncome.label: Did the disaster delay, reduce, or stop your income or the income of any of the other members of your household?

inaccessibleMoney.label: Are you or any other member of your household unable to access some of your money?

otherExpenses.label: What expenses caused by the disaster did your household pay or expect to pay between {{ benefitStartDate }} and {{ benefitEndDate }}?
otherExpenses.error: Please enter an amount for this expense.
otherExpenses.foodLoss: Food lost or spoiled during disaster

resources.header: We need to ask you some money questions.

moneyOnHand.label: How much money do you have on hand today?
moneyOnHand.explanation: Give your best estimate. This includes money in checking accounts, savings accounts, and any other cash you have available. Do not include income you recieved between [disaster start date] and [disaster end date].

incomeRecipients.label: Who received income between {{ benefitStartDate }} and {{ benefitEndDate }}?

assetsAndIncome.header: Now, tell us about {{ firstName }}’s income during the disaster.

incomeSources.label: Check all sources of income {{ firstName }} received between {{ benefitStartDate }} and {{ benefitEndDate }}?
incomeSources.hasJobs: {{ firstName }} has one or more jobs
incomeSources.otherSources: {{ firstName }} has other sources of income

pay.label: How much take home pay did {{ firstName }} receive from this job between {{ startDate }} and {{ endDate }}?

stateAgency.label: Is this employer a D-SNAP agency?

submit.header: Please review the terms and sign below, then you’re done!
submit.lede: Scroll down to agree and sign below.

submit.label: Enter your full legal name to sign this registration
submit.error: Something went wrong with your submission. Please wait a moment and try again.

ineligible.header: It looks like you may not be eligible for D-SNAP.
ineligible.lede: Please write down this registration number. You will need this number to locate this registration later.
ineligible.body: Even though you may not be eligible based on the information you gave us, you can still be interviewed by D-SNAP staff to confirm. Visit your state's D-SNAP website for details.

eligible.header: You are now ready for your interview.
eligible.lede: Please write down this registration number. You will need this number to locate this registration later.
eligible.body: Next, you will need to be interviewed by D-SNAP staff. Visit your state's D-SNAP website for details.
